offset

public Prof2d offset(double offsetDistance,
                     int offsetSide)
Returns Prof2d which is offset at a distance of 'offset' either on the inner side or outer side of this. 'offsetSide' being defined using two class variables INNER_SIDE and OUTER_SIDE.

Parameters:
offset -
Returns:
an offset Prof2d
